channel.title: The Astromancer [Neutral Investigative]
channel.description:
> **The Astromancer** :shield: > **Neutral Investigative** > > **Passive:** > **Star Map:** At the start of the game, three constellations will be formed comprising of three distinct players each. > **Lucky Star:** You are death immune once. > > **Day:** > **Asterism (inf use):** Learn if your target is part of a constellation and if yes, which one. > > **Night:** > **Stargaze (inf use):** Choose 2 players and identify if they are part of a constellation. If they are a pair you will learn their classes. This can target dead players. > **Galaxy Cross (2 use):** Learn which constellations visit your target tonight. > > *Win condition: Correctly use Stargaze to find a pair of each constellation.*
---
[details="Ability Feedback"] > Asterism: > Kape [4] holds a constellation. They are Orion! > Kape [4] isn't part of your star map. > > Stargaze: > You have identified Kape [4] as Assassin and Fake Claiming [14] as Noble. They are Andromeda! > At least one of your targets is part of a constellation. > Your targets don't hold the same constellation sign. > > Galaxy Cross: > Your target was visited by Orion, Orion and Cassiopeia last night. > Your target wasn't visited by any constellations last night. > > Win condition: > You have identified Andromeda! You still need to find Orion and Cassiopeia. > You have completed your Star Map, finding all constellations! [/details]
King cannot be part of a constellation. Constellation names: Orion, Andromeda, Cassiopeia, etc.

item.title: The Astromancer [Neutral Investigative]
item.dc:creator: katze
item.description:
Kape:

Stargaze (inf use): Choose 2 players and identify if they are part of a constellation. If they are a pair you will learn their classes. This can target dead players.

Kape:

You have identified Kape [4] and Fake Claiming [14] as Andromeda!

shouldn’t this include their classes

Read full topic

item.title: The Astromancer [Neutral Investigative]
item.dc:creator: Kape
item.description:
The Astromancer
Neutral Investigative

Passive:
Star Map: At the start of the game, three constellations will be formed comprising of three distinct players each.
Lucky Star: You are death immune once.

Day:
Asterism (inf use): Learn if your target is part of a constellation and if yes, which one.

Night:
Stargaze (inf use): Choose 2 players and identify if they are part of a constellation. If they are a pair you will learn their classes. This can target dead players.
Galaxy Cross (2 use): Learn which constellations visit your target tonight.

Win condition: Correctly use Stargaze to find a pair of each constellation.

Ability Feedback

Asterism:
Kape [4] holds a constellation. They are Orion!
Kape [4] isn’t part of your star map.

Stargaze:
You have identified Kape [4] as Assassin and Fake Claiming [14] as Noble. They are Andromeda!
At least one of your targets is part of a constellation.
Your targets don’t hold the same constellation sign.

Galaxy Cross:
Your target was visited by Orion, Orion and Cassiopeia last night.
Your target wasn’t visited by any constellations last night.

Win condition:
You have identified Andromeda! You still need to find Orion and Cassiopeia.
You have completed your Star Map, finding all constellations!

King cannot be part of a constellation.
Constellation names: Orion, Andromeda, Cassiopeia, etc.

Read full topic
